Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.directory

Class FacultyDirectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.directory.FacultyDirectory
  • public class FacultyDirectory
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains a directory of all Faculty enrolled at NC State. All Faculty have a unique id.
    Author:
    Sarah Heckman, Will Greene

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      FacultyDirectory()
      Creates an empty Faculty directory.

      Adds a Faculty to the directory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FacultyDirectory

        public FacultyDirectory()
        Creates an empty Faculty directory.

    • Method Detail

      • newFacultyDirectory

        public void newFacultyDirectory()
        Creates an empty Faculty directory. All Faculty in the previous list are list unless saved by the user.

      • loadFacultyFromFile

        public void loadFacultyFromFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
        Constructs the Faculty directory by reading in Faculty information from the given file. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the file cannot be found.
        Parameters:
        fileName - file containing list of Faculty
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if unable to read file

      • addFaculty

        public boolean addFaculty​(java.lang.String firstName,
                          java.lang.String lastName,
                          java.lang.String id,
                          java.lang.String email,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          java.lang.String repeatPassword,
                          int maxCredits)
        Adds a Faculty to the directory. Returns true if the Faculty is added and false if the Faculty is unable to be added because their id matches another Faculty's id. This method also hashes the Faculty's password for internal storage.
        Parameters:
        firstName - Faculty's first name
        lastName - Faculty's last name
        id - Faculty's id
        email - Faculty's email
        password - Faculty's password
        repeatPassword - Faculty's repeated password
        maxCredits - Faculty's max credits.
        Returns:
        true if added
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if invalid password or passwords do not match

      • removeFaculty

        public boolean removeFaculty​(java.lang.String facultyId)
        Removes the Faculty with the given id from the list of Faculty with the given id. Returns true if the Faculty is removed and false if the Faculty is not in the list.
        Parameters:
        facultyId - Faculty's id
        Returns:
        true if removed

      • getFacultyDirectory

        public java.lang.String[][] getFacultyDirectory()
        Returns all Faculty in the directory with a column for first name, last name, and id.
        Returns:
        String array containing Faculty first name, last name, and id.

      • saveFacultyDirectory

        public void saveFacultyDirectory​(java.lang.String fileName)
        Saves all Faculty in the directory to a file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of file to save Faculty to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if unable to write to file

      • getFacultyById

        public Faculty getFacultyById​(java.lang.String id)
        Returns a specified Faculty.
        Parameters:
        id - Faculty's unity id
        Returns:
        a specified Faculty
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if not found in the directory
